mil7.6.2:1.2_1: cakkavāko yāva jīvitapariyādānā dutiyikaṁ na vijahati;
mil7.6.2:1.3_1: yoginā yogāvacarena yāva jīvitapariyādānā yoniso manasikāro na vijahitabbo.
mil7.6.2:2.1_1: cakkavāko sevālapaṇakabhakkho, tena ca santuṭṭhiṁ āpajjati,
mil7.6.2:2.1_2: tāya ca santuṭṭhiyā balena ca vaṇṇena ca na parihāyati;
mil7.6.2:2.2_1: yoginā yogāvacarena yathālābhasantoso karaṇīyo, yathālābhasantuṭṭho kho, mahārāja,
mil7.6.2:2.2_2: yogī yogāvacaro na parihāyati sīlena, na parihāyati samādhinā, na parihāyati paññāya, na parihāyati vimuttiyā,
mil7.6.2:3.2_1: yoginā yogāvacarena nihitadaṇḍena nihitasatthena lajjinā dayāpannena sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampinā bhavitabbaṁ.
